description: Demonstrates turn_prompt for guided iteration with max_turns

cells.name: write_content

rules.turn_prompt:
Review your blog post. Check:
- Does it address the topic: {{ input.topic }}?
- Does it meet the requirements: {{ input.requirements }}?
- Is it engaging and well-written?
- Any grammar issues?

This is turn {{ turn }} of {{ max_turns }}. Refine your post if needed.
